superbook.speaker: Charles
superbook.text: On Camazotz we are all happy because we are all alike. Differences create problems. You know that, don't you, dear sister?

superbook.speaker: Narrator
superbook.text: Oh, yes, you do. You've seen at home how true it is. You know that you're not happy at school. Because you're different.

superbook.speaker: Calvin
superbook.text: But you pretend that you aren't different.

superbook.speaker: Calvin
superbook.text: I'm different, and I like being different.

superbook.speaker: Meg
superbook.text: Maybe I don't like being different,

superbook.speaker: Meg
superbook.text: but I don't want to be like everybody else, either.
